name: RougeBlaster
description:
A little shoot em up game I made using Gamemaker Studio 2. I've only made games with scratch before, so I decided to learn an actual engine, and I made this game to figure out how it works!

Controls:

Use Mouse to Aim

Left Click to Shoot

P to Pause

Spacebar to exit to menu when you die

(You move automatically to wherever you aim, so there is no button to move)

Thanks for playing, and I hope you enjoy it!

UPDATE LOG:

1.1 (June 30, 2022):

Added healing items

Fixed bug with enemy spawning
